quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to go east. And then, attempt to travel east. With that over with, go to the south. Then, travel east. And then, try to venture south. Then, make an effort to venture west. After that, go to the south. After that, venture east. That done, go east. Then, travel north. Then, move north. After that, attempt to move north. And then, take a trip west. Then, pick up the licorice strip from the floor of the dish-pit. And once you've done that, you win!

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the cubicle.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You are in a standard kind of place. That is to say, you're in a washroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You see a cabinet. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a cabinet?[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Look over there! a box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the cookhouse. The room is well lit.

 You make out a pan. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a pan, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_1]On the pan you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. A normal kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone.

 You can make out a recliner. The recliner is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the recliner.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've entered a shower. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. It seems to be pretty standard here.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bookshelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You can make out a bed. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the bed. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette. A typical kind of place.

 You make out a board. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the board. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
This just in- You, in the studio.

 You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking locker nearby.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You scan the room for an armchair, and you find an armchair. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the armchair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The armchair appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A typical kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
I just think it's awesome that you're in a dish-pit now.

 You can make out a case. Huh, weird.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The case contains [a list of things in the c_4]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the workshop.

 Look over there! a display.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The display contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The display is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a stand. The stand is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_7] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] The stand appears to be empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. An usual one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundry place. A standard kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchen. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a chamber. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You make out a portmanteau.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cellar. An usual kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a table. [if there is something on the s_8]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookery. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a chest. Classic TextWorld.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a chair. The chair is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the chair you make out [a list of things on the s_9]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You've entered a steam room.

 You can see a rack. The rack is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_10] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Silly rack, silly, empty, good for nothing rack.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a scullery. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a platter. Now why would someone leave that there? The platter is standard.[if there is something on the s_11] On the platter you can see [a list of things on the s_11].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: it is what it is, a passageway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: The door looks manageable. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: box
infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portmanteau
infos.desc: The portmanteau looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: licorice strip
infos.desc: that's a normal licorice strip!

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is solidly built.

infos.name: pan
infos.desc: The pan is reliable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is shaky.

infos.name: platter
infos.desc: The platter is balanced.

infos.name: recliner
infos.desc: The recliner is durable.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is an unstable piece of junk.

infos.name: bed
infos.desc: The bed is balanced.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is undependable.

infos.name: armchair
infos.desc: The armchair is reliable.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is balanced.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is stable.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is undependable.

infos.name: candy bar
infos.desc: The candy bar looks tempting.

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, venture east. After that, make an attempt to go to the east. And then, travel south. And then, head east. Following that, attempt to go to the south. Then, make an attempt to venture west. Then, travel south. And then, attempt to take a trip east. That done, travel east. With that over with, try to take a trip north. With that done, make an effort to move north. And then, make an attempt to go to the north. With that accomplished, make an effort to take a trip west. Okay, and then, retrieve the licorice strip from the floor of the dish-pit. Got that? Good!
